newsitem.title: SWEDEN: SCA says to raise German fine paper price.
newsitem.headline: SCA says to raise German fine paper price.

text.p: Swedish forest products group SCA said on Wednesday it planned to increase coated fine paper prices in Germany by 10 percent at the turn of the year.

"We have carried out a price increase of 10 percent and are preparing a further 10 percent increase. This applies especially to the German market for large coated sheet," SCA managing director Sverker Martin-Lof told reporters.
He said increased demand was behind the move. "We are doing this thanks to the strong order stocks...demand is very strong," he said.
SCA said earlier on Wednesday it will probably have to cut newsprint prices before the end of the year.
